content:
# FACTORIO AGENT REPORT

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining System at position (43.0, -85.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (43.0, -85.0) mining coal (out of fuel)
- Wooden chest at position (43.5, -83.5) collecting the mined coal (contains 9 coal)
- Burner inserter at position (44.5, -83.5) rotated LEFT, taking items from position (45.5, -83.5) and dropping at the chest position (43.5, -83.5)

### Iron Smelting Setup at position (56.0, -68.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Stone furnace at position (56.0, -68.0) used for smelting iron ore into iron plates (fueled but has no ingredients to smelt, contains 1 iron plate)

### Iron Mining and Processing System at position (-5.0, -71.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (-5.0, -71.0) mining iron ore (out of fuel)
- Wooden chest at position (-3.5, -71.5) collecting the mined iron ore (contains 2 iron ore)
- Burner inserter at position (-2.5, -71.5) transferring iron ore from the chest to the furnace (fueled and working)
- Stone furnace at position (-1.0, -71.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates (working with 2 iron ore)
- Burner inserter at position (0.5, -70.5) transferring iron plates from the furnace to the output chest (fueled)
- Wooden chest at position (1.5, -70.5) collecting the processed iron plates (contains 4 iron plates)

### Copper Mining and Processing System at position (-30.0, -65.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (-30.0, -65.0) mining copper ore (fueled and working)
- Wooden chest at position (-28.5, -65.5) collecting the mined copper ore (contains 4 copper ore)
- Burner inserter at position (-27.5, -65.5) transferring copper ore from the chest to the furnace (fueled)
- Stone furnace at position (-26.0, -65.0) smelting copper ore into copper plates (working with 2 copper ore)
- Burner inserter at position (-24.5, -64.5) transferring copper plates from the furnace to the output chest
- Wooden chest at position (-23.5, -64.5) collecting the processed copper plates (contains 4 copper plates)

### Iron Mining and Processing System at position (-24.0, -62.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (-24.0, -62.0) mining iron ore (working)
- Wooden chest at position (-22.5, -62.5) collecting the mined iron ore (contains 1 iron ore)
- Burner inserter at position (-21.5, -62.5) transferring iron ore from the chest to the furnace (fueled)
- Stone furnace at position (-20.0, -62.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates (out of fuel, contains 2 iron ore and 3 iron plates)

### Iron Mining and Processing System at position (-24.0, -58.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (-24.0, -58.0) mining iron ore (out of fuel)
- Wooden chest at position (-22.5, -58.5) collecting the mined iron ore (empty)
- Burner inserter at position (-21.5, -58.5) transferring iron ore from the chest to the furnace (fueled)
- Stone furnace at position (-20.0, -58.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates (fueled but no ingredients)
- Burner inserter at position (-18.5, -57.5) transferring copper plates from the furnace to the output chest (fueled)
- Wooden chest at position (-17.5, -57.5) collecting the processed iron plates (contains 2 iron plates)

### Iron
